title: Junglee Games | SDE1 | 2024
content:
Education: Btech Tier1 NIT 
Years of Experience: 2 Months Intern

Company: Junglee Games
Title/Level: SDE1 
Location: Bengaluru
Fixed Salary: 14L
Variable pay: 1.4L
Joining Bonus: 1L
Benefits: 72k
Retention Bonus - 6L
Total CTC for first year = ~17Lpa

title: Flipkart | UI-1 | Bangalore
content:
**Education**:
B.Tech IT, Tier 3 private college (2024 passout),.

Years of Experience: 1 year Internship experience at startups
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Flipkart
Title/Level: UI Engineer 1
Location: Bangalore, India

**TOTAL CTC**: 32,57,000

Salary: 18 lakhs base
Relocation: 40k cash + 40k in travel/hotel allowances
Signing Bonus: 3 lakhs - with first month salary
Retention Bonus: 3 lakhs - at start of second year
Stock bonus: 5.07 lakhs ESOPs - evenly over 4 years
Variable Pay: 1.8 lakhs
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) for year 1: ~24.8 lakhs


Interview experience : https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5358048/Flipkart-or-UI-Engineer-1-or-Bangalore-or-Jun-2024-Offer

title: Rippling | SDE 3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech  Tier 1 College India
Years of Experience: 8+
Prior Experience: Google
Company: Rippling
Title/Level: SDE 3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 75,00,000 INR
Signing Bonus: 10,00,000 INR
Sign On Stocks (RSUs) : 150,000 USD  for 4 years
Total comp First Year(Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1.2 cr
Other details : Leaving Google due to bad wlb  and lot of politics . They are planning to put me in bottom 10 % in org and fire me to satisfy the layoff quota of each org
Thanks community for all help , I am okay with compromised wlb for good base pay
Please upvote
